mapper.update: update t_user_wallet set rmb_balance = rmb_balance + #{amount}, usable_rmb_balance = usable_rmb_balance + #{amount}, version = version + 1, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{userId}

update t_user_wallet set rmb_balance = rmb_balance - #{amount}, usable_rmb_balance = usable_rmb_balance - #{amount}, version = version + 1, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{userId} and usable_rmb_balance - #{amount} >= 0
